documents.document:
Information with Every Tweet | Downtweet.com

People are always hungry for information and it doesn’t matter if the information is really useful or not. For example, an average person may subscribe to a Hollywood newsletter that is totally unrelated to his line of work. This will satisfy one key area of that person’s life: leisure. The businessman, on the other hand, is interested in information concerning local and global markets.
http://www.mycontentbuilder.com/information-with-every-tweet/

Joining Clubs Made Easy with Downtweet | Downtweet.com

Clubs have been there around for more than one hundred years. Back then, fancy clubs were even regarded as guilds. These guilds have specific functions in the society, such as neighborhood unity, thug protection, individual rights, tax control, and even for agricultural means. Today, these guilds are now divided into smaller clubs with different purposes. Joining a club is a real fun—you get to meet a lot of people sharing the same interest that you have. More importantly, you’ll gain access to different perks and events.
http://webupon.com/social-networks/joining-clubs-made-easy-with-downtweet/

Downtweet The Marketer’s Best Friend | Downtweet.com

The Holiday Season came with a blast and many people now have extra budget that they can spend even before the year ends. On the other hand, this is an opportunity for entrepreneurs to sell their wares to many people. Today, it is somehow impossible to find entrepreneurs who are not utilizing the benefits offered by social networking sites. Through these sites, entrepreneurs can market their wares and services in an effective basis. For example, Facebook allows sellers to create a page so they can interact with their customers at all times.
http://downtweet.hubpages.com/hub/Downtweet-The-Marketers-Best-Friend

Improve Your Social Networking Experience with Downtweet | D

No matter how you look at it, Twitter is one of the most sensationalized social networking sites of today. It connected a lot of people from different parts of the world, and became the foundation of many businesses, especially those ones who live and breathe through the Internet. An ordinary Twitter user creates feeds known as Tweets that will be available to his friends and followers. Tweets are considered as broadcasts of a person’s daily activities and insights. For example, you saw a really strange flower.
http://my.opera.com/imdowntweet/blog/2012/02/08/improve-your-social-networking-experience-with-downtweet?firstpost=Y

Tweeting the Right Way with Downtweet | Downtweet.com

Have you imagined the Internet without the social network site known as Twitter? This is downright scary and unbelievable because many people today are doing their day to day activities with Twitter. Basically, Twitter is one of the easiest social networking sites today. Ranked side by side with Facebook, Twitter has a large and steady base of audience, attributed to its flexibility and easy usage.
http://www.gather.com/viewArticle.action?articleId=281474981093820

Informational Tweet At Your Fingertips | Downtweet.com

Twitter improved the lifestyle of many people in many parts of the world. At first, Twitter became a hype and many people were almost reluctant to try this new social networking site. In just few months, it boomed crazily and people are now hooked to the website's simple yet interactive user interface. Twitter allows a user to broadcast mini-information about the things he is currently doing. This information are called feeds and oftentimes, tweets. People love to create tweets because they want to inform everybody that they are doing a rather specific task.
http://goarticles.com/article/Informational-Tweet-At-Your-Fingertips/6060977/

Downtweet—A Great Web Solution | Downtweet.com

I would like to share this Twitter software I discovered recently which I find very helpful and
cool- Downtweet. Honestly, I am not a Twitter fan but I still find this Twitter search tool useful
even for passive Twitter users or non-Twitter users. Downtweet makes it possible for non-users
to still browse Twitter tweets and be updated with the trending topics on Twitter while making
multi-tasking possible for Twitter users. To be able to understand what I am talking about, you
can open another tab and visit www.downtweet.com.
http://downtweet.multiply.com/journal/item/1/1

Downtweet Releases Tweet Search Application for Twitter User

Twitter users will now have better ways to look for informational tweets. This has been made possible with Downtweet’s twitter search function. Downtweet can also be installed in blogs to increase their potential.
